    • 方法详细资料

      • startCamera

        public static void startCamera(Context context,
               int cameraType)
        start JourneyUI Camera main activity
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity
        cameraType - CAMERA_TYPE_FRONT represent front camera, CAMERA_TYPE_REAR represent rear camera

      • startFlashLight

        public static void startFlashLight(Context context)
        start JourneyUI Flash Light main activity
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity

      • stopFlashLight

        public static void stopFlashLight(Context context)
        stop JourneyUI Flash Light main activity
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity

      • startTimer

        public static void startTimer(Context context,
              long seconds)
        start JourneyUI Timer main activity
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity
        seconds - initial time of timer

      • startStopWatch

        public static void startStopWatch(Context context,
                  boolean enable)
        start JourneyUI StopWatch main activity
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity
        enable - whether to enable the stopwatch with the starting action or not

      • startCalendar

        public static void startCalendar(Context context)
        start JourneyUI Calendar main activity
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity

      • registerTorchCallback

        public static void registerTorchCallback(Context context,
                         ITorchCallback iCallback)
        register a callback for Torch
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity
        iCallback - the callback instance of ITorchCallback

      • unregisterTorchCallback

        public static void unregisterTorchCallback(Context context)
        unregister a callback for Torch
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity

      • setScreenBrightness

        public static void setScreenBrightness(Context context,
                       int brightness)
        set screen brightness
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity
        brightness - 0 to 255, 255 is maximum

      • getScreenBrightness

        public static int getScreenBrightness(Context context)
        get screen brightness
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity return brightness 0 to 255, 255 is maximum

      • getBatteryInfo

        public static BatteryInfo getBatteryInfo(Context context)
        get JourneyUI's battery info activity
        参数:
        context - Context Context of the caller activity
        返回:
        BatteryInfo current battery information

      • openAppMarket

        public static void openAppMarket(Context context,
                 java.lang.String keywords)
        open JourneyUI AppMarket detail info activity for the given packageName

      • getMobileDataEnabled

        public static boolean getMobileDataEnabled()
        get the status of MobileData enable or not
        返回:
        true for enable and false for disable
